blast the social skills [Music] Carnival tofu look at all the fun games and rides I love carnivals me too dear but sometimes I
feel a little shy around new friends I wish I knew how to make more friends easily don't worry tofu developing social skills is like
learning to ride a roller coaster it might be scary at first but with practice it becomes so much [Music] fun Tia I want to join the game but I'm
not sure how to start that's okay tofu I will guide you through first approach them with a friendly greeting learn to
greet others with a warm smile and a friendly hello or hi a simple greeting can make a big difference in starting a
conversation hi my name is Tia and this is my brother tofu hi I'm tofu nice to meet you all hi Tia and to F I'm Sarah want to join our

talk hi tofu I like the Ring Toss game the most what about you oh I love roller coaster rides they're so [Music] thrilling [Music]
great job tofu you made a new friend now the next tip is to share and take turns learn to share toys and take turns during play dates or group [Music]
activities Chile it's your turn at the Ring Toss game yay tofu thanks here you can have have my popcorn thanks Chile next be polite and kind always use
